title: DOCUMENTARY REAPING w/Justin Wells
description:
Virtually Not Alone Network Event

@justinsmorningcoffee 's Estuary documentary has turned into something larger, and the Reapers are vying for a line in the credits. I bring him some of what we have and show him around the Broken Cl0ck Tower Discord, and he gives us some tips for landing that line in the credits.

SHADOW CABAL Member Ships available at:
https://ko-fi.com/grimgriz
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/grimgriz

BEHOLDA TANK:  https://www.etsy.com/au/listing/1469226777/tank-top-womens-and-ladies-sleeveless?click_key=547bf013918a31170c4f53bff2df1921bce7dfca%3A1469226777&click_sum=1579fe9d&ref=shop_home_active_2

Join the exclusive Ba-al Bird Community:
https://twitter.com/i/communities/1669957536412213249

Goose & Rascal Artistry:
https://mudhutillustration.com/shop/

The Broken Cl0ck Tower Discord:  https://discord.gg/TT5kfzTpm2
(A discord for people who don't hate me)

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
here too:
https://grimgriz.medium.com/
